successes.title: NORTH DRINKWARE : Mt. Hood, The Oregon Pint Glass
successes.description: North Drinkware designs and produces handmade glasses for drinking craft beer. Made in Portland, OR. Inspired by the mountains.

Pledges.description: VIRTUAL CHEERS.  Thanks for your support.  We will raise a glass in your name and down some Oregon beer in your honor.
ONE OREGON PINT GLASS. One handmade Oregon Pint glass to drink the beer you love.
ONE OREGON PINT GLASS. One handmade Oregon Pint glass to drink the beer you love.
ONE OREGON PINT GLASS and ONE MT. HOOD COASTER. One handmade Oregon Pint glass to drink the beer you love and one coaster. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear.

ONE OREGON PINT GLASS and ONE MT. HOOD COASTER. One handmade Oregon Pint glass to drink the beer you love and one coaster. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear. *note September delivery
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: TWO OREGON PINT GLASSES FOR $30 EACH. ($38 retail value)  These glasses will never be offered at this price again.
TWO OREGON PINT GLASSES. Two handmade Oregon pint glasses so you don't drink alone.
TWO OREGON PINT GLASSES. Two handmade Oregon pint glasses so you don't drink alone.       *note September delivery
TWO OREGON PINT GLASSES and TWO MT. HOOD COASTERS. Two handmade Oregon pint glasses so you don't drink alone and two coasters. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear.

TWO OREGON PINT GLASSES and TWO MT. HOOD COASTERS. Two handmade Oregon pint glasses so you don't drink alone and two coasters. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear. *note September delivery
FOUR OREGON PINT GLASSES. Four handmade Oregon pint glasses to enjoy with family and friends.
FOUR OREGON PINT GLASSES. Four handmade Oregon pint glasses to enjoy with family and friends. *note September delivery

FOUR OREGON PINT GLASSES AND FOUR COASTERS. Four handmade Oregon pint glasses to enjoy with family and friends and four Mt. Hood Coasters. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear.

FOUR OREGON PINT GLASSES AND FOUR COASTERS. Four handmade Oregon pint glasses to enjoy with family and friends and four Mt. Hood Coasters. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear. *note September delivery

TEN OREGON PINT GLASSES and FOUR MT. HOOD COASTERS. 10 handmade Oregon pint glasses to have a party and outfit your kitchen / restaurant / bar and four Mt. Hood Coasters. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear.

TEN OREGON PINT GLASSES and FOUR MT. HOOD COASTERS. 10 handmade Oregon pint glasses to have a party and outfit your kitchen / restaurant / bar and four Mt. Hood Coasters. Coasters are Made in Portland, Oregon by our friends at Shwood Eyewear. *note September delivery

MAKE YOUR OWN SET OF TWO OREGON PINT GLASSES. Show up in Portland (travel not provided) on a date set in the future (between March and June 2015) you will get to join the North team in the hot shop and make your own set of two glasses.  We will blow the glass on day one (one hour session) and cut and polish on day two (one hour session).
